content.text:
# Franklin City School District, Warren County, Ohio

Franklin City School District (commonly known as Franklin City Schools) is a public school district located in Franklin, Ohio.[http://www.franklin-city.k12.oh.us Franklin City Schools: District Information]  The school district serves the city of Franklin and parts of Franklin Township in Warren County. The district includes six schools, providing education from pre-kindergarten through 12th grade.
-->

The school district’s general offices are located at 754 E 4th Street in Franklin. The superintendent is Michael Sander.
Schools in District
*Franklin High School - Grades 9-12
*Franklin Junior High School - Grades 6-8
*Intermediate Campus - Grades 3 - 5
*Hunter Elementary School - Grade 2
*Gerke Elementary School - Grade 1
*Schenck Elementary School - Grades Pre K - Kindergarten
